attributes.action: Waive the £65 settle status fee for EU nationals.
attributes.additional_details:
This will prove very costly to families. 

Also, EU nationals were excluded from the EU referendum, yet they are being asked to pay for a fee to be able to stay in their homes. 

The home office has said that this is an admin fee comparable to a British passport, yet this is compulsory in order to not become an illegal immigrant whereas to take out a passport is not.
attributes.background:
The newly created settle status requires all EU nationals that would like to stay in the UK after brexit to apply for it. 
The fee for adults is £65 and for holders under 16 is £32.50. 
Regardless of time spent in the UK every EU national will be required to pay.
